channel.title: UpJumpsDaBoogie.com PODCAST
channel.description: Home of dj d-smooth mixes and the upjumpsdaboogie.com team

item.title: We're Vibin S2. episode 0 (Jan 9 07)
item.description: dj d-smooth and bedrock back in season 2 of we're vibin'

item.itunes:subtitle: We're back with season 2 of We're Vibin' on UpJumpsDaBoogie
item.itunes:summary: We're doing it up again in Tita's basement. Please visit this podcast at http://www.upjumpsdaboogie.com/
